snippet: Chris Crane, a deportation officer who leads the union of immigration enforcement agents, has made it his mission to stop a bipartisan bill to overhaul the immigration system.
abstract: Federal deportation officer Chris Crane is making it his mission to stop bipartisan bill to overhaul immigration system; Crane, who heads union of immigration enforcement agents, has testified about bill in House Judiciary Committee, securing his record as most frequent witness on Capital Hill during immigration debate.
lead_paragraph: Chris Crane, a deportation officer who leads the union of immigration enforcement agents, has made it his mission to stop a bipartisan bill to overhaul the immigration system.

headline.seo: For Chris Crane, a Quest to Block an Immigration Bill
headline.main: Single-Minded Mission to Block an Immigration Bill
headline.print_headline: For Deportation Officer, a Single-Minded Mission to Block an Immigration Bill
